step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arms comfortably overhead and fingers open as you begin.
Nicely done stretching your arm overhead. Ensure your fingers are open wide.
Great job making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to inhale as you tighten.
Excellent stretch back overhead while exhaling. Relax your muscles fully.
You completed the first repetition well. Focus on controlled movements.
Good job initiating the second rep. Maintain an open hand position as instructed.
You're doing great! Keep those fingers spread wide as you reach overhead.
Excellent fist and shoulder blade squeeze. Remember to breathe in as you tighten.
Well done extending your arms overhead and exhaling. Relax and reset.
You've finished the exercise! Your movements were controlled and followed the instructions.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers open when stretching overhead and squeeze your shoulder blades together as you make a fist. Continue practicing these controlled movements to help with lymph drainage.
